thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I ordered an Arizer Solo with Planet of the Vapes, and I was extremely surprised and pleased with the service. I got my package in the mail in 3 days, and they even threw some extra things in there as a bonus. Keep up the good work! I will definitely order with you all again!
